Posts.Content: Try adding Glucosime and Chondroitin.  I have been on Fermera for about 1 year and I was stiff like a board so I did a bit of research.  I started it last Friday and it just took a few days and what a difference.  It may cause stomach upset.  Check with your pharmacy.  This is an over the counter vitamin. Try it. I hope it makes a difference for you. Bette
Posts.Title: Aromasin or Femara developed rash

Posts.Content: Romans 15 4-5, 13 "...by the encouragement of the scriptures we might have hope.  May the God of steadfastness and encouragement grant you to live in harmony with one another." "May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, so that you may abound in hope by the Power of the Holy Spirit"  I am only 1 year post diagnosis Survivor, but my Dr. said "HAVE FAITH In me" I feel God was talking through her. Great plan and thank you for spreading his word. Bette in Winnipeg
Posts.Title: I need some inspiration

Posts.Content: Have they checked to see if it is a yeast infection or Diaper rash per se,  some of these meds can lead to that.  Try Diaper cream it might does the trick.  I hope this helps
Posts.Title: Aromasin or Femara developed rash

Posts.Content: Brit it seems these shoes are worn by many families.  My diagnosis was about 1 year ago.  I live in Canada so our Cancer treatment might be a bit different due to our health care systems.  However today I was getting treatment and was reading a book exactly about this.  If you can for your mom and your family set up a TEAM approach.  Maybe you can be 'THE COACH'. Get together with family, friends, collegues from work, church etc. and see who would be willing to help with whatever they can.  Some suggestions are cooking, laundry, cutting the grass, cleaning the house, getting kids lunches made, take them to games or whatever. Tell your mom to take notes or maybe she can get her visits taped so she can replay the information given to her.  Most Cancer Care office offer social workers of some kind as well, for the patient and the family.  See what her state offers for support. It's an endless road at the beginning it seems, but slowly the terminology and routine will be understood and life will be a different 'normal' for all of you. Please keep us posted and if you have any questions let them fly there is a lot of information you can gain from sites like this. Bette Winnipeg, Canada
Posts.Title: Mom was just diagnosed with Stage IV Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Sometimes hotspots mean the bone is also regenerating due to meds you are on.  I had a similar experience and my Onc sent me for an xray because the scan came back saying my hips were about to break, but it's the opposite.  Maybe ask for another opinion or a separate xray. I hope your results bring your clear sailing. Miscmom4
Posts.Title: Question about mets to the spine

Posts.Content: Joyce I am so glad you are starting to get some relief.  It may take a few more days, but keep on truckin.  I still have a bit of pain in my wrists, but otherwise my legs and body feels almost back to normal. Again WOW, great to hear. Bette :)
Posts.Title: Glucosamine/Chrondroitin

Posts.Content: I am going on a 3 month holiday from Herceptin because my heart scan came back at 47%, the Dr. figures in 3 months we will be back on track, has any one else been in this situation?  I am not scared yet, just a bit nervous.  I have estrogen positive breast cancer.
Posts.Title: Herceptin and taking a Break

Posts.Content: Hi Karen I quickly googled these symptonms and you might be having an allergic reaction.  Phone your doctor ASAp
Posts.Title: femara and chest pain

Posts.Content: Yup, kinda lke the flu, achy etc.  try  heat packs or ibuprofin or tylanol whatever the doctor suggested.  It usually only lasts a day or so   Good luck
Posts.Title: leg and knee pain during chemo

Posts.Content: You must go on, don't let Cancer control you, you control it.  I have Stage IV, had mets on lungs(gone) on my spine, down to about 1mm, I have been on Herceptin for almost 2 years and things are doing well,  I have regular 3 months appointments and heart scans. I have talked to women who have been Stage IV for more than 10 years.  If you look at it like this, we are all numbers, birthdays, anniversaries, number of children had, jobs had, etc. etc.  So this is just another number on the Chart of Life.   God Bless and good luck and keep fighting for everything you possibly can.
Posts.Title: stage 4 triple positive breast cancer

Posts.Content: You are not crazy that's for sure.  Get yourself some Glucosimine and Chondroitin from the Drug Store.  Unless you are allergic to Shell Fish.  But otherwise talk to you pharmasist and then the onc.  The over the counter stuff helps with the stiffness big time.  I take it 3xs a day. Get it and it should really help
Posts.Title: side effects of Femara

Posts.Content: Hi Joyce I bought them over the counter.  Talk to your pharmasist.  The generic name is Glucosine and Chondroitine. In Canada they are about $15 a bottle for about 125 tablets.
Posts.Title: side effects from femara

Posts.Content: Hi there, I did 4 rounds of Taxotere after 3 of FEC and really didn't have many side effects.  My checks would get a bit rosy and warm but no nausea.  Yes I had to take  steroids for 2 1/2 days.  I really hope you have great faith and stay strong and positive. Bette from Winnipeg
Posts.Title: Taxotere

Posts.Content: Try Glucosimine and Chondrotin, it really works
Posts.Title: side effects from femara

Posts.Content: Hi Joyce I bought them over the counter.  Talk to your pharmasist.  The generic name is Glucosine and Chondroitine. In Canada they are about $15 a bottle for about 125 tablets.
Posts.Title: side effects from femara

Posts.Content: It is very hard to have family far away and they are sick.  Hopefully you can make an appointment with your mom and her doctor to talk things over so that you have some type of time line and maybe they can try a different chemo.  See if you mom would be able to have injections to help her white blood cells comeback faster it does help many people.  I hope you can get to see your mom and make a plan.  I would let your boss know and the children's  school know there is a family illness and in case of an emergency that you can just go and be with your mom. I pray that God with grant your family strength, safety and health during this journey. I know from experience in have a sister far away who was very ill it is just gut wrenching.  If you can talk to your mom everyday it might help. Best WIshes
Posts.Title: Mom has cancer and I'm far away

Posts.Content: Genetic testing with a simple blood test can check  for BRCA1 and BRCA2, a pair of genes involved in breast cancer.   This can take several months to several years.  I have been tested as I am battle Stage IV Metastactic breat cancer and I lost a sister 21/2 years ago to breast Cancer. Talk to you doctor or Cancer Centre. Also be wary of Dave and some of his chatter. Best of Luck
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Gene

Posts.Content: Maybe ask about radiation to relieve the pain.  I had one round on my hip and spine and it certainly helped in getting rid of almost all the pain. Keep on your doctors for help and if not look for another doctor, I am sure someone can help you.   Good luck
Posts.Title: Anyone have this symptom...what stage
